sourcesContent:
import Vue from 'vue'
import Vuex from 'vuex'
import router from './../router'
import status from '@/store/modules/status.js' 
import users from '@/store/module/users.js'
import posts from '@/store/module/posts.js'

Vue.use(Vuex)


export default new Vuex.Store({
  state: {
    logged: GetAccessInfo(),
    currentUser: GetUser(),
    users: [],
    step: 1,
    post: newPost(),
    posts: [
      newPost(),
    ],
    status: [
      newStatus(),
      newStatus(),
      newStatus(),
      newStatus(),
      newStatus(),
      newStatus(),
      newStatus(),
      newStatus(),
      newStatus(),
      newStatus(),
      newStatus(),
      newStatus(),
      newStatus(),
      newStatus(),
      newStatus(),
    ],
    oneStatus: newStatus(),
  },
  mutations: {
    nextStep: state => state.step++,
    backStep: state => state.step--,
    setStep: (state, payload) => (state.step = payload),
    addPost: (state, payload) => (state.posts.push(payload)),
    addStatus: (state, payload) => (state.status.push(payload)),
    setCommentPost: (state, payload) => (state.posts[payload.id].comments.push(payload)),
    setCommentStatus: (state, payload) => (state.status[payload.id].comments.push(payload)),
    resetPost: state => state.post = newPost(),
    resetStatus: state => state.oneStatus = newStatus(),
    Register: async (state, payload) => {
    let result = await users.RegisterUser(payload)
    state.currentUser = result
     localStorage.setItem('user', JSON.stringify(state.currentUser))
     router.push('login')
    },
    Login: async (state, payload) => {
      let result = await users.LoginUser(payload)
      console.log(result)
      localStorage.setItem('accessInfo', JSON.stringify(result))
      state.logged=GetAccessInfo()
      router.push('/')

    }
  },
  actions: {},
  getters: {
    getLogged: state => state.logged,
    getCurrentUser: state => state.currentUser,
    getPost: state => state.post,
    getStatus: state => state.oneStatus,
    getPosts: state => state.posts,
    getStep: state => state.step,
    getStatus: state => state.status
  },

  modules: {
    users,
    posts,
    status
  }
})
